import os
import cv2
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
%config InlineBackend.figure_formats = ['svg']
source.54fe40ec:
np.random.seed(42)
random9imageindices = np.random.choice(train.index, 15)

fig, ax = plt.subplots(3, 5, figsize=(12, 5))
ax = ax.flatten()

for i, idx in enumerate(random9imageindices):
    path = os.path.join('../input/us-license-plates/data', train.loc[idx, 'Label'], train.loc[idx, 'Image'])
    img = cv2.imread(path)
    img = cv2.resize(img, (500, 200))
    ax[i].imshow(img)
    ax[i].set_title(train.loc[idx, 'Label'])
    ax[i].axis('off')
plt.show()
